name: Hourglass (muts)
description:
A simple meditative game about managing time and space. Made for GamePlus Jam

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Left Mouse Button to grab and interact with Hourglasses

NOTE: the glow thing is kind of buggy in the WebGL version, as it is checking the mouse position, and not the center of the screen. If you start the game by clicking on the center of the screen you might minimize this error.
